resources.string: The (U.S.) declaration of Independence was Adopted in 1776.
The supreme Law of the land is the Constitution.
The two rights in the declaration of Independence are: \n \t life \n \t pursuit of happiness.
Freedom of religion means: \n \t You can practice any religion, or not practice a religion.
Journalists is one branch or part of the government.
Congress does not make federal laws.
There are one hundred (100) U.S. Senators.
